title: Product Recommendation: FB Purity
summary:
Key ideas
- Scott shares his frustration about people sharing political content on Facebook.
- He found a solution in the form of the FB Purity add-on for Firefox that allows him to fine-tune his Facebook settings.
- With FB Purity, he can avoid seeing links or image macros and turn off invitations to participate in virtual games.
- Facebook is trying to ban FB Purity and sue its creator.

Key learnings
- It is possible to adjust Facebook settings with third-party add-ons to avoid seeing unwanted content.
- Social media can be enjoyable with the right settings in place.

Key questions
- How can we balance staying connected with friends and avoiding unwanted content on social media?
- What are the ethical concerns with Facebook trying to ban and sue the creator of FB Purity?
